Findings

  • £394,900 in likely duplicate payments (104 high-confidence groups)
  • £3.1 million in possible duplicates (758 medium-confidence groups)
  • £368,900 in suspected split payments (4 instances)

Split Payment Concerns

The 4 suspected split payment instances totalling £368,900 deserve attention. Split payments occur when a purchase that should go through competitive procurement is divided into smaller amounts that fall below procurement thresholds.

While not all split patterns are deliberate — operational urgency and budget cycles can create similar patterns — the £368,900 figure warrants investigation by the council's internal audit team.

View the evidence on our Spending page.
